text: Shame is a novel by Swedish crime-writer Karin Alvtegen. It was shortlisted for the Duncan Lawrie International Dagger award for crime novels in translation, and was translated into English by Steven T. Murray in 2006. The novel was originally published in Sweden in 2005. ==Other websites== * Publisher's page for the novel Category:2005 books Category:Swedish novels Category:Crime fiction books
title: Shame (Alvtegen novel)
